alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Pembina; Ramsey; Steele; Traill; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 5:45PM CST until January 14 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...BLIZZARD WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST Monday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. If outside, make sure you wear appropriate winter clothing. Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
